snippet.title: KLAUS - Announce Trailer | PS4 & PSVita
snippet.description:
“I don't know who I am
I don’t know where I am
I just woke up in this basement
With the word KLAUS
Written in my arm.”

http://klausgame.com/

Klaus is a 2D puzzle/platform game coming in 2015 to PlaySation Network store for PlayStation Vita and PlayStation 4

©2014 La Cosa Entertainment. Klaus is a trademark of La Cosa Entertainment LLC.
